page.title: 09Clubs&C'ttees.S'key&C'thrpe.
page.content: In 1981-82 old Army Hut replaced by Village Hall built by voluntary labour. {Village Hall Committee:}comprised of 7 Parish Councillors and 2 members each from other Committees in village (Social Club, Social Services, Football Clubs, Cricket Club, Women's Institute). {Social Club Committee:}Club started in 1982 in Village Hall. Has about 200 members from surrounding villages, includes regular visitors. Open to tenn-agers. Amenities: snooker, billiards, darts, table tennis, discos, dances, monthly Bingo, annual parties. Mostly paid for by Bar. {Other associations:}W.I., meets in Hall. Small membership in village of Independent Order of Oddfellows Manchester Unity Friendly Society.
